mapper.select: select Y.* from (select rownum rnum, X.* from (select B.*, F.renamed, F.ext, U.nick, decode(goodbad, null, 0, goodbad) as goodbad from board B, (select * from files where type=1) F, users U, (select ref, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0))-sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as goodbad from recommend where type=1 group by ref) R where B.id = F.ref and B.id = U.id and B.no = R.ref(+) order by B.no desc) X) Y where Y.rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update board set count=count+1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select rownum rnum, X.* from (select B.*, F.renamed, F.ext, U.nick, decode(good, null, 0, good) as good, decode(bad, null, 0, bad) as bad, decode(goodbad, null, 0, goodbad) as goodbad from board B, (select * from files where type=1) F, users U, (select ref, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0)) as good, sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as bad, sum(decode(good_bad, 1, 1, 0))-sum(decode(good_bad, 2, 1, 0)) as goodbad from recommend where type=1 group by ref) R where B.id = F.ref and B.id = U.id and B.no = R.ref(+) order by B.no desc) X where X.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values (board_seq.nextval, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), #{id})
mapper.update: update board set content=#{content} where no = #{no}
